titleStmt.title: John Whipple to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2212

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
New York Sept 26th 1865
To his Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Gov State of Ky
Sir
I have the honour to solicit the appointment of Commissioner of your State for the State of New York.
Referring you to the Gentlemen on the reverse of this that I remain with great respect

Your obedient servant
John Whipple Jr
HENDRICKSON & WHIPPLE,
Attorney & Counsellors at Law,
37 PINE STREET, NEW-YORK.
The undersigned have entered into a copartnership for the transaction of a general LAW AND COLLECTION BUSINESS at the above place.
Any business that may be placed in their hands will receive faithful and diligent attention.

REFER BY PERMISSION TO
Messrs. BROWN BROS. & CO., New-York.
" ANTHONY & HALL, "
" HEINEMANN & PAYSON, "
CLARKSON N. POTTER, Esq., "
HON. SAMUEL AMES, Chief Justice Supreme Court, R. I.
Messrs. J. & W. S. SLATER, Providence, R. I., and Norwich, Conn.
Messrs. BROWN & IVES, Providence, R. I.
His Excellency Gov Swann Md.

Comr Deeds
New York
John Whipple Jr
comd
2 Oct/65
